p: The results concerning the effects of ZMEO on tissue bacteria counts are represented in Figure 2(C). The results showed that topical administration of therapeutic ointments significantly decreased bacterial colonization in all the days compared to the NCG group ( p < 0.05). The comparison between treatment groups demonstrated that a higher level of ZMEO (4%) significantly decreased the total bacterial count compared to that of a lower level of it (2%) and MG groups ( p < 0.05).
